items.title: Investors to focus on US Fed interest rate decision this week: Analysts
items.description: The Indian equity market had an exceptional last week, with both the Nifty and Sensex hitting their all-time high levels on Thursday

items.title: Mcap of 9 of top-10 most valued firms jump Rs 2 trn; Bharti Airtel sparkles
items.description: Bharti Airtel's valuation jumped Rs 54,282.62 crore to Rs 9,30,490.20 crore, becoming the biggest gainer among the top-10 firms

items.title: FPIs inject Rs 27,856 cr in equities in Sept on US rate cut expectations
items.description: Also, a series of regulatory reforms aimed at streamlining the process for FPI investments has further uplifted investor sentiment
